I am an Assistant Teaching Professor in the Department of Spanish and Portuguese Studies and Director of Lives in Translation (LiT), the Translation and Interpreting program at Rutgers University in Newark. Through LiT, I coordinate community-based initiatives centered on critical civil engagement and teach translation and interpreting students through experiential learning to prepare for nationally recognized certifications.

I am also a Ph.D. student in Bilingualism and Second Language Acquisition in the Department of Spanish and Portuguese at Rutgers University - New Brunswick.

## Research Interests

- Translation Technologies
- Human-Computer Interaction (HCI)  
- Morphosyntactic Transfer and Processing
- Second Language Acquisition
- Bilingualism
- Language Access Advocacy
